name: Mahjong Clash
description:
Mahjong Clash is the brand new way to play the classic puzzler.

Are you the greatest Mahjong player in the world? Find out with Mahjong Clash, the most exciting way to play Mahjong ever!

- Fight your way to the top of the leaderboard by playing online against your friends and the rest of the world.

- Or relax with over 1000 levels in single player mode, including the classic Turtle, Cloud and Spider.

- Featuring stunning graphics and effects and hauntingly beautiful soundtrack. This game will change the way you play Mahjong forever!

With Mahjong Clash you can enjoy all the familiar Mahjong puzzles, plus over 1000 more in the relaxing single player mode. Or, if you want to find out how good you really are, Mahjong Clash allows you to challenge the world in our unique multiplayer mode. Just pick a puzzle and you and your opponent will start from the same position in the same puzzle. Whoever score the most points in the game moves up the leaderboard! Challenge your Facebook friends or challenge the world. You'll never want to play Mahjong any other way!
